title: Sura Siragadikkum Nilavu Lyrics Sura song lyrics
stanzas:
Singers :   Karthik, Reeta

Siragadikkum nilavu karam pidithathu ennai
Paarthavudan unnai thandhuvitten ennai
Iruvarukkum mattum vendum oru boomi
Kaavalukku vendum kaadhalennum saami

En veettil ella puramum un vaasam yen thanthaai
En veettil ellaa puramum un vaasam yen thanthaai
Sila neram yaarai kettu enakkulle nee sendraai
En kaalgal thaniyaaga un pinne selgirathe
En nenjam thunaiyaaga un vazhiyil kidakkirathe
Sooriyanai thindra malligaiyum needhaan
Vennilavai tholil sumanthavanum needhaan

Aagaayam thaandida nenjam ippodhu ninaikkirathe
Aagaayam thaandida nenjam ippodhu ninaikkirathe
Azhagaana thavarugal kooda nee seiya pidikkirathe
Ariyaadha kuzhanthai pol en manadhu kudhikkirathe
Yedhedho vendum endru adam pidithu ketkirathe
Pattiyalai ezhuthu tharugiren naane
Ottumotha thevai nee oruvan thaane
